roadmap.name: Colony Foundation
roadmap.goal: Colony state persists safely across context refreshes with corruption-proof JSON storage and pheromone signal system

roadmap.name: Worker Ant Castes
roadmap.goal: Six Worker Ant castes exist as prompt files and can spawn via Task tool with inherited context

roadmap.name: Pheromone Communication
roadmap.goal: Colony coordinates through stigmergic pheromone signals with time-based decay and caste-specific sensitivity

roadmap.name: Triple-Layer Memory
roadmap.goal: Colony memory compresses across three layers (Working → Short-term → Long-term) preventing context rot

roadmap.name: Phase Boundaries
roadmap.goal: Colony operates through explicit state machine with phase boundaries, checkpoints, and recovery capability

roadmap.name: Autonomous Emergence
roadmap.goal: Worker Ants detect capability gaps and spawn specialists automatically with safeguards against infinite loops

roadmap.name: Colony Verification
roadmap.goal: Multiple verifier perspectives validate outputs with weighted voting and belief calibration

roadmap.name: Colony Learning
roadmap.goal: Colony learns which specialists work best for which tasks using Bayesian confidence scoring

roadmap.name: Stigmergic Events
roadmap.goal: Pub/sub event bus enables colony-wide asynchronous coordination between Worker Ants

roadmap.name: Colony Maturity
roadmap.goal: End-to-end colony validation with comprehensive testing and production readiness

INIT.description: Queen sets colony intention - strongest attract signal that establishes goal
INIT.effect: Establishes colony goal and mobilizes all Worker Ants

FOCUS.description: Queen guides colony attention to specific area - medium attract signal
FOCUS.effect: Increases priority of tasks in focused area

REDIRECT.description: Queen warns colony away from approach - strong repel signal
REDIRECT.effect: Creates avoidance pattern for specified approach

FEEDBACK.description: Queen provides guidance based on observations - variable signal
FEEDBACK.effect: Adjusts colony behavior based on Queen observations

signal_combinations.description: Colony responds to pheromone signal blends

examples.effect: Increased sensitivity in focused area with behavioral adjustment
Goal established with avoidance patterns for specific approaches
Colony prioritizes by effective strength (signal × sensitivity)

colonizer.name: Colonizer Ant
colonizer.description: Colonizes codebase, builds semantic index, detects patterns

route_setter.name: Route-setter Ant
route_setter.description: Creates phase structures, breaks down tasks, analyzes dependencies

builder.name: Builder Ant
builder.description: Implements code, runs commands, manipulates files

watcher.name: Watcher Ant
watcher.description: Validates implementation, runs tests, checks quality

scout.name: Scout Ant
scout.description: Gathers information, searches documentation, retrieves context

architect.name: Architect Ant
architect.description: Compresses memory, extracts patterns, synthesizes knowledge

working_memory.description: Immediate context for current session - 200k token capacity

short_term_memory.description: Compressed recent sessions - DAST 2.5x compression, max 10 sessions

sessions.summary: Phase 1: Implemented colony state schemas with JSON persistence

high_value_items.content: Use atomic writes for state files
Use atomic writes for state files
Use atomic writes for state files
Use atomic writes for state files
Use atomic writes for state files

long_term_memory.description: Persistent patterns and learned expertise - associative links

triggers.description: Compress Working Memory to Short-term at phase completion
Compress when Working Memory exceeds 80% capacity
Queen can trigger compression via /ant:memory compress

pattern_extraction.description: Extract high-value items from Short-term to Long-term

associative_linking.description: Create semantic connections between related items
